english.segment1: Broken heart. one more time. pick yourself up. why even cry?
english.segment2: Broken pieces. in your hands. wonder how. you'll make it whole
english.segment3: You know, you pray. this can't be the way. you cry, you say. something's gotta change. and mend this porcelain heart. of mine..of mine.
english.segment4: Someone said. a broken heart. would sting at first, then make you stronger
english.segment5: You wonder why this. pain remains. were hearts made whole, just to break???
english.segment6: You know, you pray. this can't be the way. you cry, you say. something's gotta change. and mend this porcelain heart. of mine
english.segment7: Creator, only you take brokenness. and create it, into beauty. once again
english.segment8: You know, you pray. this can't be the way. you cry, you say. something's gotta change. (x2)
english.segment9: And mend this porcelain heart, please, mend this porcelain heart. of mine
english.segment10: Of mine.. creator, mend this heart
